word:
MR No. 1433 - Inadequate Royalties on Spirit of Prophecy, Vol. IV

      (Written to J. H. Waggoner and C. H. Jones, March 7, 1885, from Healdsburg, California.) 


     I have read your letters once, and will read them more carefully later, but I find nothing in them to lift the weight from my mind in regard to arrangements for the publication and sale of my books.
